timeline.message: XRDDEV-831: added the dialog functionality and translations

timeline.author: Riippi

replies.bodyText:
Actually not needed in this instance. I am used to writing .then(_ => {}) in which case "_" marks the unused parameter, otherwise it will be an error or a warning.
Since the linter changes it to (_) => {} then it is no longer needed.
Fixed.
replies.author: raits
